title: Start
body:
This is a rhythm game.
It's also a puzzle game.
This is a "visual novel".
Good luck!
[[shave]]

title: shave
body:
<<Playsound knock>>
->*knock*
    [[failshave]]
->...@timer@1000
<<Playsound knock>>
->*knock*
    [[failshave]]
->...@timer@500
<<Playsound knock>>
->*knock*
    [[failshave]]
->...@timer@500
<<Playsound knock>>
->*knock*
    [[failshave]]
->...@timer@1000
<<Playsound knock>>
->*knock*
    [[failshave]]
->...@timer@1800
<<playsound silence>>
->*knock*
->...@timer@400
    [[failshave]]
<<Playsound knock>>
->*knock*
    [[failshave]]
->...@timer@800
<<playsound silence>>
->*knock*
    <<playsound knock>>
    [[winshave]]
->...@timer@400
    [[failshave]]

title: winshave
body:
Nice one!
Next one's a little harder, and probably the last one because I have zero time to finish this.
[[morse]]

title: morsefail
body:
Nope! Try again.
->K
    [[morse]]
->Did you know you can use number keys to select options?
    And space to advance the text!
    ->cool, try that morse thing again.
        [[morse]]
->Restart game
    [[Start]]

title: morsewin
body:
Good job! You did it!
Game over. You win! Thanks for playing.
Game by bowlercaptain
Knocking sound effect from "door knocking troll sound" on Youtube.
Have a nice day.
